title: The contribution of METANET4U

author: António Horta Branco, University of Lisbon

segmentation: Good morning everyone.
My name is Antone link.
I'm here.
Presenting the contribution of our project Metanet for you.
2D Meta share exchange platform.

Um?

In February 2013.

English, Spanish and Portuguese and European languages.

Contributes for the uniting of European linguistic infrastructure.

Regards the documentation side.

I meant that the records for our resources.

We have associated the licenses for concrete cases for specific resources.
Uncovering issues discovering untapped problems and so on.

Consortium.

Own labs, but also that we can attract from labs and form restitutions not belonging to our project.

OK, so finally the last dimension.
I leave this to the end because it's one damage that we should share very much presence where we are trying to push forward.
